UI.status_neutralino: Neutralino status. Restart app if red.

log.dashd_stopped: Dashd didn't answer. Already stopped or configuration error.
log.dashd_start_error: Error starting dashd. Perhaps the path in the neutralino.config.json file is incorrect. Or Neutralino doesn't work.
log.dashd_path_error: Invalid dashd.exe path. Check neutralino.config.json file
